EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshop_Q216_St Louis2.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/st-louis]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in St. Louis. See event details below:
Date: June 15, 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM Location: CenturyLink Development Center, 575 Maryville Centre Drive, Suite 400, St. Louis, MO 63141
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/st-louis]]>.
